results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እንደ ዘይት አተላ ነው፡፡ በሆዶች ውስጥ የሚፈላ ሲኾን፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ያዙት፤ ወደ ገሀነም መካከልም በኀይል ጎትቱት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከዚያም «ከራሱ በላይ ከፈላ ውሃ ስቃይ አንቧቡበት፡፡»
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
